entities.name: stag
entities.description: A Patronus mentioned by a Death Eater, initially thought to be a stag but later corrected to a goat.

entities.name: goat
entities.description: The correct animal that the Death Eaters were referring to, mentioned by the barman.

entities.name: patronus
entities.description: A magical creature that can take on various forms, mentioned as a stag and later corrected to a goat.

entities.name: death eater
entities.description: A group of dark wizards and witches who are enemies of Harry Potter, mentioned in the text.

entities.name: high street
entities.description: A location where the Death Eaters were heading after leaving the bar.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of Harry Potter's friends, mentioned as moaning with relief and sitting down on a chair.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, mentioned as drawing curtains and pulling off the Cloak.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of Harry Potter's friends, mentioned as having the Cloak pulled off by Harry.

entities.name: barman
entities.description: A person working at a bar where the Death Eaters were present, mentioned as correcting the Death Eater's mistake about the Patronus.

relationships.description: The Death Eaters were heading towards the High Street after leaving the bar, as mentioned in the text.
Harry pulled off the Cloak from Ron, as mentioned in the text.
The barman corrected a mistake made by one of the Death Eaters about the Patronus, as mentioned in the text.
